page_content: Discusses taxation for juridical persons in the Canton of Schwyz.
Provides legal foundations for the valuation of agricultural and non-agricultural properties for tax purposes.
Provides updates on tax regulations and mentions the availability of eTax.SZ Desktop Application and a Chatbot for tax-related queries.
Discusses eBau, an electronic building permit procedure, and provides guides for its usage.
Provides guidelines and fact sheets for withholding tax calculations and procedures.
Discusses the management and recycling of construction waste in the Canton of Schwyz.
Provides tax-related information and guidelines for self-employed individuals in the Canton of Schwyz.
